tweet.text: On February 19, 1952, Dean Acheson became the first Secretary of State to be received by Queen Elizabeth since her accession to the throne less than two weeks before. For a brief account of the meeting at Clarence House, read in #FRUS: https://t.co/sI7Q9pXSFJ https://t.co/vaXbKVOO9Z
tweet.html: On February 19, 1952, Dean Acheson became the first Secretary of State to be received by Queen Elizabeth since her accession to the throne less than two weeks before. For a brief account of the meeting at Clarence House, read in #FRUS: ow.ly/mFsr50KHvwM
